CustomField.description: If first extension then calculated as 60 days prior to Original Asset Maturity Date - Completed Extension Date. Any extension after calculated as Extension Completed Date - (Previous Asset Maturity Date or Property Extension Created Date). If Previous Asset Maturity Date > Property Extension Created Date then use Property Extension Created Date or else use Previous Asset Maturity Date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If first extension then calculated as 60 days prior to Original Asset Maturity Date - Completed Extension Date. Any extension after calculated as Extension Completed Date - (Previous Asset Maturity Date or Property Extension Created Date). If Previous Asset Maturity Date > Property Extension Created Date then use Property Extension Created Date or else use Previous Asset Maturity Date.
CustomField.label: Days To Resolve
